_comment: Created by NCODowd on 27/04/2016 10:33:39 using v2.7
title: How has the proportion of obese 10-11 year old children changed over time?
analysis_commentary: One in three children in year 6 were overweight or obese in 2014/15. This is considerably higher than the proportion of obese children in reception year. The proportion of year 6 children who are obese has increased by 1.6 percentage points since 2006/07. The proportion who are overweight or underweight has remained stable over this time period.
